title: Shifting Shadows: Stories from the World of Mercy Thompson
description: Mercy Thompson’s world just got a whole lot bigger…A collection of all-new and previously published short stories featuring Mercy Thompson, “one of the best heroines in the urban fantasy genre today” (Fiction Vixen Book Reviews), and the characters she calls friends…Includes the new stories…“Silver”“Roses in Winter”“Redemption”“Hollow”…and reader favorites“Fairy Gifts”“Gray”“Alpha and Omega” (Alpha & Omega 0.5)“Seeing Eye” (Alpha & Omega 1.5)“The Star of David” (Mercy Thompson 1.5)“In Red, with Pearls” (Mercy Thompson 6.5)
author: Patricia Briggs
